languages.text: {n}Когитатор абсолютно безмолвен, однако, приблизившись, вы чувствуете исходящее от металлического корпуса тепло — верный признак того, что машина работает.{/n}
{n}The cogitator is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic frame — a tell-tale sign that the machine is working.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когитатор абсолютно безмолвен, однако, приблизившись, вы чувствуете исходящее от металлического корпуса тепло — верный признак того, что машина работает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cogitator is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic frame — a telltale sign that the machine is working.{/n}

{n}The cogitator is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic frame — a tell-tale sign that the machine is working.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这台沉思者没有发出任何声音，但当你接近时，你感觉到它的金属框架传来了暖意。这表明这台机器正在工作。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic frame — a tell-tale sign that the machine is working.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这台思考器没有发出任何声音，但当你接近时，你感觉到它的金属框架传来了暖意。这表明这台机器正在工作。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cogitador se mantiene totalmente en silencio, pero al acercarte sientes cómo emana calor de su armazón metálico; señal de que la máquina está en funcionamiento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic frame — a tell-tale sign that the machine is working.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cogitador se mantiene totalmente en silencio, pero al acercarte sientes cómo emana calor de su armazón metálico; señal de que la máquina está en funcionamiento.{/n}

languages.text: {n}考算機は完全に沈黙しているが、近づいてみると金属の筐体から発されている熱を感じる…機械が稼働している紛れもない証拠だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic frame — a tell-tale sign that the machine is working.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}考算機は完全に沈黙しているが、近づいてみると金属の筐体から発されている熱を感じる…機械が稼働している紛れもない証拠だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Cogitator verursacht nicht das geringste Geräusch, aber als du dich näherst, spürst du Wärme von seinem Metallrahmen – ein klares Zeichen, dass die Maschine arbeitet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic frame — a tell-tale sign that the machine is working.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Cogitator verursacht nicht das geringste Geräusch, aber als du dich näherst, spürst du Wärme von seinem Metallrahmen – ein klares Zeichen, dass die Maschine arbeitet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le cogitateur est totalement silencieux, mais vous sentez la chaleur qui se dégage de son enveloppe métallique à mesure que vous approchez... signe indéniable que la machine fonctionne.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic frame — a tell-tale sign that the machine is working.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le cogitateur est totalement silencieux, mais vous sentez la chaleur qui se dégage de son enveloppe métallique à mesure que vous approchez... signe indéniable que la machine fonctionne.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kavramsayardan ses çıkmasa da yaklaşınca metalik kasasından yayılan sıcaklığı hissedebiliyorsun. Belli ki makine çalışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator is completely silent, but as you approach, you sense the warmth emanating from its metallic frame — a tell-tale sign that the machine is working.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kavramsayardan ses çıkmıyor ama yaklaşınca metalik kasasından yayılan sıcaklığı hissedebiliyorsun, makine belli ki çalışıyor.{/n}
